current_movies.title: The Matrix
current_movies.description: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

current_movies.title: Inception
current_movies.description: A thief who enters the dreams of others to steal their secrets finds himself tasked with planting an idea into a CEO's mind.

current_movies.title: Forrest Gump
current_movies.description: The story of a man with a low IQ who rose above his challenges, and who proved that determination, courage, and love are more important than intellectual ability.

current_movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
current_movies.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

current_movies.title: Pulp Fiction
current_movies.description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.
